property.value: (Heroes Only) (You may play this card to stop and attack from a personality's POWER instead of as an attack.) Physical attack. DAMAGE : AT +3 stages. HIT: Shuffle a non-Personality/non-Mastery card in play into its owners Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: (This card is considered a Styled and Named card for your card effects. If this card is placed into your hand by a card effect, you may use a critical damage effect.) IF your MP's power level is hight than your opponent's MP's power level, destroy up to 2 Setups and/or Drills.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You cannot win by MPPV if you advnace a personality level with this card's effect.) {INSTANT} POWER: Use when entering combat. Name 2 different cards. Destroy the top 2 cards of your Life deck to destroy the top 2 cards of you opponent's Life Deck. If the cards you named were destroyed, advance or lower your MP 1 level, and then you may advance or lower you opponent's MP 1 level. (Banish after use).

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. Lower your opponent's anger 2 level. DAMAGE : 3 stages + AT life careds. HIT : The next time one of your effects destroys cards from teh to pof an opponent's Life eck this combat, you may increase that amount by 2.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 1. (If this cad is destroyed from your Life Deck by one of your effects you may place it into your hand.) Physical attack. If your opponent has no cards in his hand, damage from this attack cannot be prevented. DAMAGE : 5 Life cards.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 3 stages. Attach to your MP. While attached, you may lower your opponent's anger 1 level whenever you destroy cards from your opponent's Life Deck. Banish this card when your opponent's MP changes levels. DAMAGE : 6 life cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Whenever one of your Setups, Drills, or Allies leaves play this combat, you may destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. You may destroy a Styled Setup you control. If you do, seach your discard pile for a Styled Setup and place it into play. DAMAGE : 5 stages. HIT : If one of your opponent's card effects modified the damage of this attack, draw a card. (Banish after use)

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: You may search your Life Deck for up to 3 Allies and banish them. Destroy the top X cards of your opponent's Life Deck. X = the number of Allies in your Banished Zone. (Banish after use)

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. Your next attack this combat has its power stage cost reduced to 0. Damage : AT + 4 stages. HIT : Choose an Ally in play and place it at the bottom of its owner's Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. Attach to your MP. While attached, your Named cards are considered Styled for your effects. DAMAGE : AT +4 stages. HIT: Your MP gains 3 stages.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 1 stage. Whenever you Rejuvenate this combat, your opponent's MP loses 1 stage. DAMAGE : 4 stages. HIT : Rejuvinate 1.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. Reveal your hand. DAMAGE: 4+ X stages. X = the number of Dragon Balls you revealed. HIT : If your opponent prevented damage from this attack, draw a card. (Banish after use)

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 2. POWER: Your styled attacks deal +2 stages of damage this combat. Banish all non-styled cards in your discard pile. Banish all non-styled cads in your opponent's dicard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT] Your attacks deal +1 stage of damage. Whenever you play a card with 'Sword' in the title, destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE : 5 stages HIT : Search your Life Deck for a non-Styled Drill and place it into play.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 1 stage. Prevent all damage from the next non-Styled attack your oppoent performs this combat. DAMAGE: 4 life cards. HIT: Your opponent's non-Styled attacks deal -2 life cards of damage this combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (When this card is Rejuventated, lower your opponent's anger 1 level) Energy attack costing 3 stages. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. This attack cannot be stopped by a non-Styled card. DAMAGE : 5 life cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT] Drills in your Life Deck without Endurance gain 'Endurance 3' POWER: Discard a Drill from your hand to destroy the top 3 cards of you opponent's Life Deck. If you discarded a Styled card, draw a card

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical attack

property.name: Text
property.value: The next time you reveal a card from your hand this combat, you may raise your anger 2 levels. DAMAGE AT +3 stages. HIT: Damage from your attacks cannot be prevented this combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Use only if you have performed at least 2 other Styled physical attacks this combat. This attack cannot have its damage modified.) Physical attack. This attack stays in play to be used a second time this combat. DAMAGE : 5 stages. (Banish after use)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. Raise your anger 1 level. You may lower your anger 3 levels to search your discard pile or Banished Zone for a card that can attack to an MP and place it into play attached. DAMAGE : 5 life cards

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. If you have performed an attack from your discard pile this combat, raise your anger 2 levels. DAMAGE : 4 stages. HIT : If your MP is a Hero, your next Styled attack this combat gains 'Raise your anger 1 level.'

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 4. POWER: Rejuvenate a Styled card from your discard pile. Attach to your MP. While attached, whenever you would advance a personality level you may lower your anger to 0 instead. If you do, use a critical damage effect.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 3 stages. You may discard a card from your hand to draw a card. DAMAGE : 5 life cards. HIT : If this attack dealt five or more stages of damage, draw a card. (Banish after use)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 3. (This card's Endurance is considered to be 5 for your card effects.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. If your MP's level is higher than your opponent's MP's level, non-Styled cards cannot be played this combat. DAMAGE : 4 life cards. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. Raise your anger 1 level. Dragon Balls lose all effects for the remainder of combat. DAMAGE : 5 life cards (Banish after use.)
